name: Battle City Siren (Skill Card)
text:
Mai / Skill
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Skill Effect ]
Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can change the battle position of 1 monster your opponent controls. 
This turn, the first attack you declare must target that monster. 
This Skill can only be used twice per Duel.
